entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: v0.14.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(deps): update dependency axios to v1.8.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/300
  • chore(deps): update dependency @vitejs/plugin-react-swc to v3.8.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/299
  • chore(deps): update dependency @types/react to v19.0.12 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/298
  • chore(deps): update dependency @playwright/test to v1.51.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/296
  • fix(deps): update dependency react-router-dom to v7.4.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/307
  • chore(deps): update eslint monorepo to v9.23.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/306
  • chore(deps): update dependency testcontainers to v10.21.0 - autoclosed by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/292
  • chore(deps): update dependency vite to v6.2.2 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/289
  • fix(deps): update module google.golang.org/api to v0.227.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/286
  • chore(deps): update dependency vite to v6.2.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/308
  • fix(deps): update module cloud.google.com/go/documentai to v1.36.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/309
  • chore(deps): update dependency testcontainers to v10.22.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/310
  • [fix for #311] CreatedDatePrompt to derive date when no day or month were pâ€¦ by @hensing in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/312

New Contributors

  • @hensing made their first contribution in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/312

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.14.0...v0.14.1

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: v0.14.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • HOTFIX - make auto-process not silently fail on document update failure (=endless loop) by @thiscantbeserious in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/319

New Contributors

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: Fix custom OCR prompt + stability improvements
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • chore(deps): update dependency vite to v6.2.4 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/320
  • Refactor - Move background logic to background.go (and background_test.go) by @thiscantbeserious in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/321
  • fix(ocr): Fix custom OCR prompt by @icereed in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/323

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.14.2...v0.14.3

entry.title: New release for Paperless GPT: v0.15.0 Azure DocAI markdown output
entry.content:
Azure DocAI Markdown Output

This adds a new environment variable for the Azure DocAI provider that adds the markdown output format query parameter to the processing request. It has no effect unless the new variable is added to the .env config and the model ID is also changed to prebuilt-layout, as described in the updated readme. Having the content in markdown adds additional context for the original document, which is useful when LLM tools are reading the content.

What else Changed

  • chore(deps): update dependency typescript to v5.8.3 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/335
  • fix(deps): update dependency @headlessui/react to v2.2.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/331
  • chore(deps): update dependency vite to v6.2.6 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/341
  • chore(deps): update react monorepo to v19.1.1 by @renovate in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/339
  • Feature/Azure DocAI markdown output option by @cbrown350 in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/346

New Contributors

  • @cbrown350 made their first contribution in https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/pull/346

Full Changelog: https://github.com/icereed/paperless-gpt/compare/v0.14.4...v0.15.0
